rooms.description: Spacious entry with Vastu compliant north-east facing entrance.
Large area for social gatherings, designed to face the east according to Vastu principles.
Separate dining space integrated with living room, positioned in north direction.
Functional kitchen with south-east orientation as per Vastu for fire element.
Luxurious bedroom with attached bathroom and balcony overlooking the garden.
Additional bedroom with ample closet space; north facing to ensure positive energy flow.
Third bedroom suited for children or guests, east facing.
Private area for household staff, located in a quieter zone on the west side of the ground floor.
Guest room positioned towards the north-west to ensure comfort and privacy.

openings.details: Double door entry with ample lighting ensuring security and adherence to Vastu principles.
Provides natural light and ventilation, enhances the living experience.
Large windows to allow sufficient natural light and cross ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Separate entrance for servants ensuring privacy and ease of access.
